To work under water for longer times, I have to take along air. The simple Tanks I created are useful for that, in combination with a light aluminum casing I can take the tanks as a backpack.
I also added a controller and a compressor, for an automatic refill of the tanks outside of the water.

Display: The filling level of the tanks is shown using the normal oxygen bar. If it's empty (after 2 min), your oxygen tanks are empty. Your oxygen will be filled up one time, when this happens, and depletes in usual speed.
Outside of the water the tanks refill slowly, as long as they are equipped.
